title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When I click on the 'Close All Saved' button, nothing happens.
EB: The file should be closed as no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make sure that at least one of the files has been saved.
3. Click on the 'Close All Saved' button.
4. Verify that all the saved files are closed without any prompt for saving changes.
